title: Thank you Matt
content: Hello Matt, this is Ilio Pieroni thanking you for explaining that my problem was caused by VPN doing a very good job in masking me out of existence, and being blacklisted. The moment I turned it off, every worked again. I contacted bitdefender, including your response. Waiting for a replay. Thank you again Matt, much appreciated. Regards Ilio Pieroni
creator: Iliopier

title: Thunderbird just updated and most of my e-mails became unreadable
content:
This is what most of my received e-mail messages now look like:

<td align=3D"left" bgcolor=3D"#ED3B30">

Some e-mails can still be read but the message is from a previously deleted e-mail and is not what the current e-mail is about. (A message from a previous e-mail has been inserted into the body of the new e-mail and the info. in the new e-mail has vanished.)

Can someone help me? Thank you.

title: Enable Calendars in TB 115.10.1
content:
I have nine calendars on my TB calendar page.

Some weeks ago, seven of them stopped displaying. They each have a gray Enable button next to their name in the Calendars list, but it doesn't do anything.

How can I reenable these calendars?

(14 other people have a similar problem in the post Enable Calendars in TB V.115.8.0 but it has been archived.)

title: Sent folder of iCloud mail address has empty messages
content: I have two iCloud mails in Thunderbird. The older one runs great. For the other new one - same settings - mails sent often appear totally blank in the sent folder. Going to the iCloud webmail, sent messages appear totally normal and mails are sent to destination without any problem. I tried everything, no avail. Also weird is I have two "sent" folders (for no clear reason). Both have this issue, not always. See screenshot of iCloud webmail.

creator: rezganj

title: Download Xfinity/Comcast email to Thunderbird
content:
I am maxing out my Comcast email space allowance (10 gb) and want to move it all to my PC. (i don’t want an encrypted backup, but something readable.) I thought I could use Thunderbird and set up a POP3 account on Thunderbird with the option to leave emails on the server. It downloaded only the Inbox, not the subfolders. I read on the Forum that that is what happens with POP3. My understanding of IMAP is that I don’t get the actual email on Thunderbird, because it stays on the Comcast server.

Is there a way to download all those emails and folders to Thundebird (to keep) and then delete them from Comcast? I don’t plan to use the Thunderbird client for my day-to-day email, simply to store the last 10 years of email.

I have tried to research the forum articles so that I don’t bother anyone needlessly, but can’t find an answer. Thank you.
creator: lrob

title: Thunderbird does not download mail correctly
content:
I have Thunderbird V115.15 in Windows 7. Last week it stopped working correctly. Now if it starts a download from gmail it fails saying the account is being accessed by something else (but it isn't). Then when it does try to download the messages I either get 3 to 10 copies of every message or every message is blank and from a blank sender. Right now it is reporting 542 messages being downloaded but all are empty with no from info and those messages are from a week ago.

I am pulling my hair out trying to get this back to functioning!

Thank you
creator: southern-boy

title: New format for presenting E-mail messages
content: You can help by going back to the old format. The new format makes it more time-consuming to delete unneeded messages because the screen shows only a small number of messages at a time. Also, the smaller print is less user-friendly.
creator: czuvekas

title: Unable to delete messages
content: When I delete a message from my inbox, all of a sudden all the e-mails vanish. Every folder is empty. Then I exit Thuderbird and run in it again, and all the messages are there, including the one I deleted. This started yesterday. It is frustrating. This is happening to everybody I know.
creator: lubenica09

title: cant select OAuth2-option on SMTP-outgoing server
content:
Hi dear Mozilla-Community,

I have run into the issue that is described here: https://www.reddit.com/r/Thunderbird/comments/1fdwv49/what_is_thunderbird_doing_to_fix_this_outlook_in/ and solved here: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/microsoft-oauth-authentication-and-thunderbird-202

Now, the issue for me is that i cannot select the OAuth2-password option on my outgoing server option because it simply is not there (see screenshot attached - it's in German but you will get the idea). Ingoing has been changed (automatically, I suppose) to OAuth2 and works just fine but the outgoing is broken.

I am on the newest Nebula 128...esr.

What can I do? Thanks a lot in advance!

Best regards, Konrad
creator: konrad.sternisko

title: Problema su calendario dopo ultimo aggiornamento
content: Dopo l'aggiornamento di Thunderbird del 1 ottobre 2024 non riesco più a spostare un evento sul calendario semplicemente trascinandolo da una data ad un'altra. Adesso mi tocca fare tasto destro, Taglia e poi Incolla nella nuova data, dovendo pure scegliere tra i vari calendari che utilizzo in quale copiare. C'è qualche impostazione che devo settare o controllare? Capita anche ad altri? Vi ringrazio fin d'ora per ogni possibile aiuto.

title: Specific problem with Thunderbird
content:
Hello,

My client has a specific problem with Thunderbird, when he does something with mail for example moving it to a certain folder or deleting one, all emails disappear, then when he restart the app all emails show up again and that mail is not deleted/moved, I tried all of the suggestions in the attachment and problem sometimes disappear for 1-2hrs but always occurs again. Also Thunderbird generated 50+ Inbox folders by itself and it keeps making them all alone. I assume the problem is with some corrupted file but his thunderbird backup is about 50GB and he needs it all to be imported. It really drives me crazy.

Thank you in advance for your support, Hope we will solve this issue.
